quote: If you make a promise, you keep it, if you make a mistake, you apologize... And if you give someone a dream, you defend it to the end.
author: Childe

quote: Der Mensch muss sein Dasein erfahren. Im Schmerz. Im Rausch. Im Scheitern. Im Höhenflug. Im Gefühl der vollständingen Machtfülle über die eigene Existenz. Über das eigenen Leben und den eigenen Tod.
author: Moritz

quote: Das Leben ist ein Angebot, das man auch ablehnen kann.
author: Moritz

quote: Nur wenn ich mich auch für den Tod entscheiden kann, besitzt die Entscheidung zugunsten des Lebens einen Wert.
author: Moritz

quote: People can find ways to forget, but they can't undo what they've done and there's no escaping the past.
author: Unknown

quote: Power isn't determined by your size, but the size of your heart and dreams!
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: No matter how hard or how impossible it is, never lose sight of your goal
author: Monkey D. Luffy

quote: The wish of wanting everyone to be happy is merely a fairy tale!
author: Archer

quote: If you walk down the path that you believe is right, you cannot be wrong.
author: Shirou Emiya

quote: That is why I will keep running for now. If I aim for the distance, there should come a day when I would be able to reach out to what I have been aiming for.
author: Shirou Emiya

quote: If you have a wish, don’t go back to the past and redo everything. If you want to change yourself, don’t change the past, but change who you are now!
author: Shirou Emiya

quote: People cannot change the past. All we can do, is accept our own actions. If you still wish to be burdened by your sins, let it show in your future actions. It is your choice how to perceive something that has already happened.
author: Kirei Kotomine

quote: All things are impermanent and to exist is to suffer
author: Xiao

quote: You are my sadness and my hope. But mostly, you're my love.
author: Wanda Maximoff

quote: There are rules in life. We can’t rush aging just because it’s convenient. And we can’t reverse death
author: Wanda Maximoff

quote: No one bad is every truly bad. And no one good is ever truly good.
author: Loki

quote: Freedom is life's great lie. Once you accept that, in your heart, you will know peace.
author: Loki

quote: I arrived only in time to hear her dying breath. Why did she go to Khaenri'ah first, and not I. Why did she keep me in the dark about it? Was it to shield me? [...] Facing the fact that she is gone is... unbearably painful
author: Raiden Ei

quote: For those that live too long, the friends of days gone by and scenes from their adventures live on in their memories. As such I have no regrets in meeting you, friend. Should the day ever come that we are not together, you will continue to shine like gold in my memories.
author: Zhongli

quote: Feelings are worth feeling, even if they hurt
author: Eclipsa
source: Star vs. the forces of the evil

quote: You deserve the love you are trying to give to others all the time.
author: Unknown

quote: I will never apologize for my heart that breaks so easily but loves so strong
author: Unknown

quote: It may be that a perfect being does not exist at all in the whole world. Sometimes two people who appear to be completely opposite are actually two sides of the same coin and can only succeed when they work together.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: True change cannot be made if it is bound by laws and limitations, predictions and imagination
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: The eyes sees only what the mind is prepared to comprehend
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Loneliness is dangerous. Once you know how addicting it is, you don't want to deal with people anymore.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Use your insecurities to improve yourself, not to self-destruct and destroy others
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Sometimes you have to be the bad guy to do something good, or you have to be the good guy to do something bad.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: When the power of love overcomes the love for power, the world will know peace.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Teachings that do not speak of pain have no meaning, for humankind cannot gain anything in return
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: People's live don't end when they die. It ends when they lose faith
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Time doesn't heal anything. It just teaches us how to live with pain.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: No matter how good your heart is, eventually you have to start treating people the way they treat you.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: No single thing is perfect by itself. That's why we're born to attract other things to make up for what we lack. I think we start walking in the right direction only after we start getting our counterparts besides us.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Each of us lives dependent and bound by our individual knowledge and our awareness. All that is what we call reality. However, both knowledge and awareness are equivocal. One's reality might be another's illusion. We all live inside our own fantasies.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: No matter who you are, you do not truly know what kind of man you will become until you reach the very end.
author: Itachi Uchiha

quote: Our actions are our own, but fate pushes us.
author: Regina

quote: Horse: "You fell, but I have got you."
author: Charlie Mackery
source: The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

quote: Horse: "I know, tears fall for a reason, and are your strength, not weakness."
author: Charlie Mackery
source: The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

quote: Horse: "Life is difficult, but you are loved."
author: Charlie Mackery
source: The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

quote: Fox: "You know, sometimes, your minds plays tricks on you. It can tell you you are not good, that it's all hopeless, but I discovered this: You are loved and important, and you bring to this world things, that no one else can. So hold on."
author: Charlie Mackery
source: The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

quote: You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and the only way, it does not exist.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Wenn man sich auf die Liebe einlässt, setzt man alles aufs Spiel, ohne Angst. Wenn du gewinnst, sei glücklich. Und wenn du verlierst, ist das Spiel noch lange nicht aus.
author: Shah Rukh Khan
source: Die Liebe ist eine schwierige Herzensangelegenheit

quote: Es ist schon merkwürdig mit den Erinnerungen. Unser Leben lang versuchen wir, etwas zu vergessen und schaffen es nicht. Aber wollen wir uns an eine Kleinigkeit erinnern, fällt sie uns einfach nicht ein
author: Shah Rukh Khan

quote:
Liebe… Liebe ist Freundschaft.
Wenn sie nicht meine beste Freundin sein kann, dann kann ich sie auch nicht lieben. Ohne Freundschaft gibt es keine Liebe.
Ganz einfach, Liebe ist Freundschaft.
author: Shah Rukh Khan
source: Und ganz plötzlich ist es Liebe

quote: Wenn man schon leiden muss, sollte die andere Person es schon mitkriegen. Wem bringt es etwas, sich still zu quälen? Niemanden!
author: Shah Rukh Khan

quote: Wenn du im Leben etwas erreichen willst, wenn du gewinnen willst, dann höre auf dein Herz. Und wenn dein Herz einmal nicht antwortet, dann schließe die Augen und denke an deine Eltern, so wirst du keine Angst mehr haben und alle Hindernisse überwinden. Dann kannst du alles erreichen, einfach alles.
author: Shah Rukh Khan
source: In guten, wie in schweren Tagen

quote: Es heißt, die Zeit würde alle Wunden heilen. Doch das Leben fügt einem manchmal Wunden zu, die so tief gehen, dass sie niemals heilen und im Laufe der Zeit immer nur tiefer und tiefer werden.
author: Shah Rukh Khan
source: Lebe und denke nicht an morgen

quote: Maulwurf: "Eine unserer größten Freiheiten liegt darin, wie wir auf etwas reagieren."
author: Charlie Mackery
source: The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

quote: Ursache und Wirkung sind zwei Seiten einer einzigen Tatsache.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Pferd: "Du bist gefallen, aber ich bin da."
author: Charlie Mackery
source: The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

quote: Pferd: "Ach was. Tränen haben immer einen Grund. Sie sind deine Stärke und keine Schwäche."
author: Charlie Mackery
source: The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

quote: Pferd: "Das Leben ist nicht einfach, aber du wirst geliebt."
author: Charlie Mackery
source: The boy, the mole, the fox and the horse

quote: Le passé, c'est douloureux, mais à mon sens on peut soit le fuir, soir tout en apprend.
author: Rafiki
